Chinwendu Ihezuo onye nke ana akpọ Chinwe Ihezuo (Ọmụmụ 30 April 1997) bụ nwa afọ nke Nigeria na akụ bọlụ nke na akụrụ ndi BIIK Kazygurt nke Kazakhstan na ndi ụmụ aka na erubeghi afọ iri abụọ nke ndi oyibo kpọrọ Nigeria women's national under-20 football team.
Amụrụ Ihezuo na esi 30 nke ọnwa anọ na afọ 1997 na Ajegunle, Lagos, Nigeria. Ọmụmụ na ọzụzụ ya bụ kwa na ebe ndi ogbenye ọnụ ntụ nke Ajegunle
Nwa ada nkea toro ogologo nke ọnụ ọgụ 1.7Àtụ:Height. Nne na nna ya nyere ya nkwalite nke pụrụ iche mgbe obidoro kụba bọọlụ

Nne ya tinyere ya aka ma were ego nke ọna enweghi enwe zụtara ya uwe nke eji egwu eguruegwu ukwu na ahia di na obodo ha. Na oge agbọghọbia ya n'ile, ya na ụmụ okorobia ndi nke bi na Ajegunle kụkọtara ya bu eguruegwu ukwu. Obodo ndi ogbenye ọnụ ntụ nkea ana akpọ Ajegunle ebipụtala ụfọdụ ụmụ okorobia pụrụ iche ndi nke na egwu eguruegwu ukwu na obodo Naijiriya
Ma ruo echi, ọ na amasi nwa ada Ihezuo ka ya na ụmụ okorobia na egwukọrita eguruegwu ukwu.
Ihezuo bidoro kụwa bọọlụ na otu ndi nke ana akpọ BIIK Kazygurt nke di na obodo Kazakhstan na afo 2016

O binyere ha otu afọ. Na afọ nke Ihezuo kụrụ ha bọọlụ, o yinyere uwe nke ọnụ ọgụgụ iri na itolu ma rite uru egwuregwu ụkwụ iri na isii na apụmapụ iri abụọ.  Oso kwa ndi otu ya ma gwuo egwuregwu ụkwụ nke 2016-17 UEFA Women's Champions League, ebe obidoro egwuregwu na apụmapụ abụọ.
